qti_compilation_errors.description: Errors during QTI compilation phase, typically missing content for specific slots

questions.explanation: The QTI compiler expected content for a 'graph_two' slot that was not provided in the generated item

Missing image content for choice C

Missing content for radio button choice C
Missing graph showing relationship for choice C

database_update_errors.description: Failures when trying to update the questions table with generated XML

questions.explanation: Database update failed, possibly due to invalid XML format or connection issues

slot_declaration_errors.description: Mismatches between expected slots and provided slots in the structured generation

questions.explanation: The AI-generated item structure doesn't match the expected slot template

ai_generation_errors.description: Errors from the AI widget generation service

questions.error: ai widget generation: 400 Invalid schema for response_format 'widget_content_generator': context=(), $ref cannot have keyword
questions.explanation: The OpenAI API rejected the response format schema, likely due to a malformed JSON schema definition

questions.error: cube lateralHeight must be equal to side if provided: invalid base shape for polyhedron type
questions.explanation: The generated cube polyhedron has inconsistent dimensions - for a cube, all edges must be equal length
